channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: 周一在兰契举行的第四场测试赛第四天，舒伯曼-吉尔（Shubman Gill）和德鲁夫-朱雷尔（Dhruv Jurel）保持冷静，带领印度队以 5 票优势战胜英格兰队，取得了系列赛的胜利 ➡️ #AFPSports #INDvENG
item.description:
Shubman Gill and Dhruv Jurel kept calm to lead India to a series-clinching five-wicket win over England on day four of the fourth Test in Ranchi on Monday ➡️ https://t.co/MMiIbi93Zh #AFPSports #INDvENG pic.twitter.com/ptLvErYLEl

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 26, 2024

item.title: 斯威夫特效应 "席卷新加坡，酒店和航班预订一空。作为泰勒在东南亚地区的唯一一站，新加坡从泰勒创造的旅游热潮中获利，让一些邻国眼红不已。
item.description:
Hotels, flights booked out as 'Swift effect' hits Singapore.

Singapore has left some of its neighbours seeing red while it profits from a Taylor-made tourism boom as the star's only stop in the Southeast Asia regionhttps://t.co/JnUzARHaHU pic.twitter.com/ggSCYfShgN

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 26, 2024

item.title: 假爱 "加密货币骗子诱骗美国受害者。"葡萄酒交易商 "在网上向她求爱数月。然后，他又大开杀戒，在一场加密货币爱情骗局中诈骗了这位费城的专业技术人员 45 万美元。
item.description:
'Fake love' crypto scammers ensnare US victims.

The "wine trader" wooed her online for months. Then he went for the kill, defrauding the Philadelphia-based tech professional out of $450,000 in a cryptocurrency romance scamhttps://t.co/keH8s6pFDZ pic.twitter.com/tV5ZXqmIyH

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 26, 2024

item.title: 印度满载碎石的失控列车在没有司机的情况下行驶 70 公里
item.description:
Indian runaway train loaded with gravel travels 70 kilometres without a driverhttps://t.co/6fOqt012qY

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 26, 2024

item.title: #布基纳法索清真寺遭袭，当地和安全人士称数十人丧生
item.description:
#BREAKING Attack on mosque in Burkina Faso kills dozens, say local and security sources pic.twitter.com/mayRU5CsFN

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 26, 2024

item.title: 匈牙利议会将于周一批准瑞典加入北约的申请，结束一年多的拖延。
item.description:
Hungary's parliament is expected to ratify Sweden's NATO bid Monday, ending more than a year of delay.

Hungary remains the last obstacle to Stockholm's NATO membershiphttps://t.co/RIs60IPcll pic.twitter.com/ROkQjOyQuV

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 26, 2024

item.title: 去年 8 月，由于塞纳河水太脏，马拉松游泳测试赛被取消。 但巴黎市承诺 "没有 B 计划"。
item.description:
Paris holds its breath for Olympic swimming events in murky Seine.

Last August, marathon swimming test events were cancelled because the water was too dirty. But the city of Paris is committed and says "there is no plan B"https://t.co/bI1fs3KXOf pic.twitter.com/ZRXN6WGazW

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 26, 2024

item.title: 视频： 希腊最惨重的火车事故惨剧发生近一年后，大学生们手持横幅和鲜花，悼念希腊最惨重铁路事故的遇难者。在将近 19 分钟的时间里，一列客运火车和一列货运火车...
item.description:
VIDEO: Greece’s deadliest train tragedy remembered.

Holding banners and flowers, university students have paid their respects to the victims of Greece’s deadliest railway crash nearly a year after the tragic incident. For nearly 19 minutes a passenger train and freight train… pic.twitter.com/YFmtnfos2h

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 26, 2024

item.title: 以色列军队提议从加沙地带 "疏散 "平民.本雅明-内塔尼亚胡总理说，为了取得 "全面胜利"，有必要对巴勒斯坦领土南部城市拉法发动地面进攻
item.description:
Israeli army proposes "evacuating" civilians from the Gaza Strip.

Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu says a ground invasion of the Palestinian territory's southern city Rafah is necessary for "total victory"https://t.co/8QrhXFrPDm pic.twitter.com/DbYs8buLKs

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 26, 2024

item.title: 韩国呼吁实习医生重返工作岗位。政府表示，如果医生重返医院，将不会受到惩罚，因为针对医疗改革的抗议活动已进入第二周。
item.description:
South Korea calls for trainee doctors to return to work.

Government says doctors will be spared punitive action if they go back to hospitals, as protests over medical reforms enter a second weekhttps://t.co/GhInhVG529 pic.twitter.com/5NvCoPLrrG

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 26, 2024

item.title: 视频： 在莫斯科入侵乌克兰两周年之际，全球各地的抗议者集会支持乌克兰，敦促西方国家给予更多支持，因为人们越来越担心基辅是否有能力抵御胆大妄为的莫斯科。
item.description:
VIDEO: Two years in: people around the world rally in solidarity with Ukraine.

Protesters rallied across the globe in support of Ukraine on the second anniversary of Moscow's invasion, urging greater Western backing as fears mount about Kyiv's ability to fend off an emboldened… pic.twitter.com/IMIvIECaaY

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 26, 2024

item.title: "再也不会 "菲律宾抗议者周日在马尼拉游行，纪念费迪南德-马科斯下台起义周年，同时誓言防止他的儿子重蹈独裁统治覆辙。
item.description:
"Never again"

Filipino protesters marched through Manila on Sunday, marking the anniversary of the uprising that ousted Ferdinand Marcos, while vowing to prevent his son from repeating the dictatorshiphttps://t.co/Days9BMRyr pic.twitter.com/OfVce7Ymks

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 26, 2024

item.title: 哥伦比亚政府表示将开始从传说中的圣何塞号大帆船残骸中移除 "价值无法估量 "的物品。
item.description:
Treasure trove.

Colombian government says it will begin removing items of "incalculable value" from the wreck of the legendary San Jose Galleon, which sank in 1708 while laden with gold, silver and emeralds estimated to be worth billions of dollarshttps://t.co/RpbxwRXvAv pic.twitter.com/gTSqA7V5vI

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 26, 2024

item.title: #台湾驻图瓦卢大使周一告诉法新社记者，他得到了图瓦卢新任总理 "稳固、持久、永恒 "的保证，从而粉碎了这个太平洋岛国可能向北京倒戈的传言。
item.description:
#BREAKING Taiwan's ambassador to Tuvalu told AFP on Monday that he had won assurances from the country's new prime minister that ties are "rock solid, durable and everlasting", scotching rumours the Pacific island nation could flip alliances to Beijing pic.twitter.com/X72Krjc02l

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 26, 2024

item.title: "Da'Vine Joy Randolph 凭借在《The Holdovers》中饰演的配角赢得了本电影颁奖季的所有重要奖项，但她坚持认为，在奥斯卡颁奖季即将到来之际，她并不觉得这是理所当然的。
item.description:
"I take nothing for granted."

Da'Vine Joy Randolph has won every major prize going this film award season for her supporting role in "The Holdovers" -- but she insists she is taking nothing for granted as the Oscars loomhttps://t.co/yMnwf5GBUR pic.twitter.com/DtiEAVdqvb

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 26, 2024

item.title: @MichaelMathes 和 @InesBelAiba⬇️ 写道：尽管唐纳德-特朗普屡战屡胜，共和党竞争对手尼基-黑莉却誓言 "战斗仍在继续"--她将自己定位为一个可行的选择，以防这位丑闻缠身的领跑者竞选活动出现内讧。
item.description:
Despite Donald Trump's repeated victories, Republican rival Nikki Haley is vowing "the fight goes on"—positioning herself as a viable option in case the scandal-plagued frontrunner's campaign implodes, write @MichaelMathes and @InesBelAiba⬇️https://t.co/xwea9dmkgU

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 26, 2024

item.title: 一个研究须鲸音箱的科学家小组警告说，须鲸这一物种特别容易受到人类噪音污染的影响，尤其是来自航运船只的噪音。
item.description:
A team of scientists studying the voice boxes of baleen whales warned of the species' unique vulnerability to human noise pollution, especially from shipping vessels.https://t.co/6LZPtFFO99

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 26, 2024

item.title: 在德国将卖淫合法化二十年后，一场关于是否再次禁止性工作的新辩论爆发了，反对党保守派领导着一场新的禁娼运动。
item.description:
Two decades after Germany legalised prostitution, a new debate over whether to ban sex work again has erupted, with the opposition conservatives leading a fresh push for prohibition.https://t.co/2I0XHwohJQ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 26, 2024

item.title: 西非地区集团西非国家经济共同体（ECOWAS）周日表示，它将放松对军方掌权的几内亚和马里的制裁，此前一天，该集团还以人道主义为由宣布了对遭受政变的尼日尔的类似决定。
item.description:
The West Africa regional bloc ECOWAS said Sunday it was easing sanctions imposed on military-run Guinea and Mali, a day after announcing a similar decision for coup-hit Niger on humanitarian grounds. https://t.co/fIDNTxtb0Z

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 25, 2024

item.title: 在饱受战争蹂躏的苏丹，忠于军队的当局阻止了向达尔富尔西部地区提供跨境援助，此举遭到了援助人员和美国的谴责。
item.description:
Authorities loyal to the army in war-ravaged Sudan have blocked cross-border aid to the western Darfur region, a move decried by aid workers and the United States.https://t.co/QxRCdFD6Yv

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 25, 2024

item.title: 视频：乌克兰战争进入第三年，教皇方济各向乌克兰战争受害者致敬。
item.description:
VIDEO: Pope Francis pays tribute to victims of Ukraine war as it enters third year
"It is a war that not only devastates this region of Europe but also triggers a global wave of fear." pic.twitter.com/oTak0E9lXb

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 25, 2024

item.title: PSG 主场战平雷恩后，主教练路易斯-恩里克表示，即将离队的姆巴佩 "会在我需要的时候上场"。
item.description:
Soon-to-leave Mbappe will play 'when I want him', says PSG coach Luis Enrique after home draw against Renneshttps://t.co/Kt0UVh6Koz

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 25, 2024

item.title: 来自 #AFPSports：迈阿密热火队得分王吉米-巴特勒（Jimmy Butler）因在热火队与新奥尔良鹈鹕队的场上斗殴中的角色，成为周日被 NBA 禁赛的五名球员之一。
item.description:
From #AFPSports: Miami Heat scoring leader Jimmy Butler was among five players suspended by the NBA on Sunday for their roles in an on-court brawl between the Heat and New Orleans Pelicans.https://t.co/QJVXLAmBEG

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 25, 2024

item.title: 🇧🇷，前总统雅伊尔-博尔索纳罗（Jair Bolsonaro）被指控策划政变以继续掌权，他呼吁民众支持他，数以千计的巴西人周日涌上圣保罗街头。
item.description:
🇧🇷Thousands of Brazilians poured into the streets of Sao Paulo on Sunday after ex-president Jair Bolsonaro called for a show of support as he faces accusations he plotted a coup to stay in power.https://t.co/w5cX8QnuvR pic.twitter.com/CUlWUpW9rQ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 25, 2024

item.title: 一名奥地利极右翼极端分子访问了阿富汗，据说是为了证明阿富汗是一个安全的国家，他在阿富汗被拘留九个月后于周日获释。
item.description:
An Austrian far-right extremist who visited Afghanistan reportedly to prove it was a safe country was released on Sunday after nine months in detention there.https://t.co/imLjpK4IHK

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 25, 2024

item.title: 派拉蒙传记片《鲍勃-马利：Bob Marley：One Love》连续第二个周末领跑北美票房，票房收入约为 1350 万美元。紧随其后的是动画片《降魔八叶》（Kimetsu no Yaiba），这是 "恶魔杀手 "漫画系列的最新作品。
item.description:
Paramount biopic "Bob Marley: One Love" led the North American box office for a second straight weekend, taking in an estimated $13.5 million. It was followed closely by animated "Kimetsu no Yaiba," the latest in the "Demon Slayer" manga series.https://t.co/VavWCzlXrZ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 25, 2024

item.title: 自 1994 年以来一直担任白俄罗斯领导人的亚历山大-卢卡申科周日表示，他打算明年寻求连任。他的这一宣布正值该国举行被反对派和西方国家斥为虚假的议会选举之际。
item.description:
Alexander Lukashenko, the leader of Belarus since 1994, said Sunday he intends to seek re-election next year. His announcement comes as the country holds a parliamentary election decried as a sham by the opposition and the West.https://t.co/KnTyHx2AQs pic.twitter.com/q6aQ3G3X0V

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 25, 2024

item.title: 以色列周日警告说，如果主办方认为以色列参赛作品《十月雨》中的歌词过于政治化，以色列可能会退出今年的欧洲电视歌唱大赛。
item.description:
Israel on Sunday warned that it may withdraw from this year's Eurovision Song Contest if organisers reject the lyrics from its entry 'October Rain' as too political.https://t.co/5t7J0JupiU

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 25, 2024

item.title: 米兰时装周的时装秀于周日结束，让人们提前一睹 2024-2025 年秋冬女装的风采。以下是几大流行趋势 ➡️
item.description:
Milan Fashion Week's catwalk shows wrapped up Sunday, providing an early glimpse into women's looks for Fall/Winter 2024-2025.

Here are a few of the top trends ➡️ https://t.co/BF8AYnAAhx

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 25, 2024
